body:
##Panel Wrap All HTML panels should be wrapped in this code. ```
``` ##Panel Headers These are displayed at the top of the panel. Delete style='margin: 0;' if not using this element by itself. ```

Header Content

``` ##Paragraph Text Wrap body text in this tag. ```

``` ##Panel Divider Place this at the bottom of your code inside the tag to create a space between the next panel. ```
``` ##Buttons The default button to link to pages. ``` Button ```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: IHS Media Network
tagline: Various code for the IHS Media Network Radiowaves station.
